summary: Authentic: Securing the Blockchain Ecosystem - Authentic is a trusted partner in securing the blockchain ecosystem, providing high-quality security services such as DApp and PenTesting Security Audit, Smart Contract Audit, and L2 Blockchain Audit. They also offer core utilities like ERC20 Smart Contract Generator, Staking Platform, API Beta Access, and Learning Center. Authentic App focuses on blockchain and smart contract auditing, offering features like Dashboard Overview, Fast and Secure Transactions, and Audit Reports.
